Name: The Infinite Black 2
About the game: The wildly popular online space adventure returns with a gorgeous new sequel! Captain a fleet of ships to hunt aliens, trade resources, loot treasure and earn thousands of achievements. Form powerful corporations with your friends, build shipyards, then fight a never-ending intergalactic war! A single cross-platform server connects thousands of players on all desktop and mobile devices. All platform downloads and more at Join us on Discord for dev chats and launch events!
